类的使用
engine.actions.Action

使用Action的程序包
程序包 说明
actions  
actors  
engine

  • actions中Action的使用

    actions中Action的子类
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    class  CheckBookingAction
    This class is used to check a booking by input PIN code.
    class  GoBackAction
    Action to go back to the previous room.
    class  GoSubsystemAction
    Action to go to the CovidBAndTSystem(Subsystem)
    class  HomeBookingAction
    Action to create a new booking(HomeBooking)
    class  InterviewAction
    the action of an interview is used for healthcare workers/administerers
    class  LoginAction
    LoginAction class is used to login to the system.
    class  OnSiteBookingAction
    This class is used to handle the OnSiteBookingAction.
    class  ScanQRcodeAction
    Scan QRcode Action
    class  SearchSiteAction
    This class is used to search for a testing site.
    class  SignUpAction
    SignUp Action class
    class  ViewSiteListAction
    Action to view the list of sites.

    Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明

  • engine.actions中Action的使用

    返回Action的engine.actions中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Action Actions.get​(int i)
    Return the i'th Action in the collection.
    Action Action.getNextAction()
    This provides a mechanism for Actions to take more than one turn.
    返回变量类型为Action的类型的engine.actions中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.List<Action> Actions.getUnmodifiableActionList()
    Create and return an unmodifiable copy of the contents of the collection.
    java.util.Iterator<Action> Actions.iterator()
    Returns an Iterator for the underlying collection.
    java.util.List<Action> Actions.sorted​(java.util.Comparator<Action> comparator)
    Returns a sorted copy of the list of Actions.
    参数类型为Action的engine.actions中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean Actions.add​(Action action)
    Appends a single Action to this collection, if it is non-null.
    void Actions.remove​(Action action)
    Remove the first occurrence of an Action from the collection, if it is present.
    类型变量类型为Action的engine.actions中的方法参数
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void Actions.add​(java.util.List<Action> actions)
    Appends the contents of any List<Action> to this one.
    java.util.List<Action> Actions.sorted​(java.util.Comparator<Action> comparator)
    Returns a sorted copy of the list of Actions.
    参数类型为Action的engine.actions中的构造器
    构造器 说明
    Actions​(Action action)
    Constructs a collection containing a single (non-null) Action.
